article_title: Hospitals: Uncompensated Care Fell 55 Percent in Private Option's First Year
article_text: Uncompensated care fell 55 percent, or $149 million, during the first year of Arkansas' private option, according to a report released Thursday by the Arkansas Hospital Association.

article_metadata.keywords: Little Rock, Business Journal, Business news
